channel.title: Git on Hugo Ivy
channel.description: Recent content in Git on Hugo Ivy

item.title: GIT and Vagrant
item.description: GIT GIT is a Distributed Version Control System Some commands are create a new repository on the command line echo “# website” >> README.md git init git add README.md git commit -m "first commit" git remote add origin https://github.com/Username/website.git git push -u origin master or push an existing repository from the command line git remote add origin https://github.com/Username/website.git git push -u origin master Vagrant Vagrant from HashiCorp is a good tool for spinning up environments and test.
